modName: Vanilla Style Saturation Boost - FXAA Tool Guide (FPS Lossless)
summary:
Features:
- FXAA Tool Install/Set Guide (NVIDIA Only)
- Increase Saturation & Texture Quality (lore-friendly)
- No Performance Loss
- Compatible with all DLC and Mods
